attributes.action: Install BroadBand into The Isle of Grain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I remember The PM giving a speach shortly after he was elected in, that, "he wanted to see everyone have access to BroadBand within the UK".  For several reasons BT have made numerous excuses why they can not supply a BroadBand connection!  It would be wonderful if your office could look into this problem...
